results.title: Simvastatin suppresses experimental aortic aneurysm expansion.

results.title: Treatment with simvastatin inhibits the formation of abdominal aortic aneurysms in rabbits.
results.text_hl: The aim of this study was to determine whether treatment with @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ can influence the development of experimental @<m>DISEASE_Aortic_Aneurysm</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D001014 @@@aortic aneurysms@@@ in a @SPECIES_9986 @@@rabbit@@@ model.
